name: Bronzette
description:
Summer is ending and you're still as pale as at the beginning of the holidays. Come on, smear suntan cream all over your body and don't leave the lounge chair till you roast ! Except if it's raining...

Game made with Construct 2. It is a suntan simulator or a mini-summery-survival game.

L'été touche à sa fin et vous êtes toujours aussi pâle ! Allez on se badigeonne de monoï et on ne quitte plus la chaise longue ! Sauf en cas d'averse...

Jeu réalisé avec Construct 2. Il s'agit d'un simulateur de bronzage ou encore d'un mini survival en milieu estival.

Controls

WASD or ZQSD or Arrows + Spacebar
English and French supported

Credits

Art / Code / Sound Design by Tweedle Dim
Music by Guillaume Bourrachot

Thanks to

Katharine for fixing my english
Yoann and Pierre for testing
Athena and Théodora for the laughs recording
